description: Translate only rows where sp1, sp2, sp3 or sp4 is not empty. Note that none of these rows have NFL info.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: notNull(soil_moist_reg);notEmpty(soil_moist_reg);matchList(soil_moist_reg,{'Dry','Fresh','Moderately Dry','Moderately Fresh','Moderately Moist','Moderately Wet','Moist','Very Fresh','Very Moist','Very Wet','Wet'})
translation_rules: mapText(soil_moist_reg, {'Dry','Fresh','Moderately Dry','Moderately Fresh','Moderately Moist','Moderately Wet','Moist','Very Fresh','Very Moist','Very Wet','Wet'}, {'DRY','MESIC','DRY','MESIC','MOIST','WET','MOIST','MESIC','MOIST','WET','WET'})

description: No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

translation_rules: yt_lyr_layer_translation(height_1_layer1, height_1_layer2, {species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2}, layer)
